description._content: Description: Camper Wong Mei-ling (holding stick) playing the Chinese version of billiards. This is a favourite indoor game with Chinese children. Location: Silvermine Bay, Hong Kong Date: 1962 ------------------------------------------------------ Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/479. This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons. Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
